attributes.action: Consider the abolishion of final salary pensions within the public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years now workrs within the private sector have seen there pension disappear.  Why therefor are the public sector employees of this country protected under the pretence that they are underpaid (but now we have the minimum wage).

I therfor propose that the government remov this benefit (in line with the private sector) that we, the country are paying for. Through our council tax's also that the government clearly show how much this benefit is costs each constituant.

If the governent want to help in the credit crisis remove this chain/timebomb which we are all funding via our council tax's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
